title: Fixed Nokhud Offensive Auto-Route creator issues

changes.change: Enemies in the Nokhud Offensive have been placed exactly where they are in the in-game map. As a result, added support for a higher zoom level for Nokhud Offensive.

The above was needed to make the Auto-Route creator work properly for Nokhud Offensive. Most issues have been resolved - though the area around the last boss may still be problematic, this will be reviewed later.
